turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like to order a pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need four small

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Give me veggie lovers on all of those, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, any other requests for your pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, make sure they are gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, any sides or drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you. That will be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $52, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be dining in, picking up or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks. Goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: just show them your receipt which will be texted to you shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it. Goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.
